name: findway
description:
A simple shooting games.

You were born on a desert island, surrounded by dangers, hand by inch iron, how do you get through the current difficulties? Pick up the guns around you, take advantage of them, go through the zombies and explore the unknown.




You can:



Take your weapon,



Kill the enemy or all the characters in front of you.



Enemy types: fast moving characters and immovable characters.



Operation mode



Right click the target



WASD controls motion



Left mouse button attack



Mouse control direction



E loading weapons
